arts.ttl: Victor Osimhen’s Saudi Rejection: Galatasaray Adventure Continues
arts.sum: Victor Osimhen's journey with Galatasaray is set to continue, as the Nigerian striker has reportedly turned down a lucrative offer from Saudi Arabia. The forward, currently on loan from Napoli, is thoroughly enjoying his time with the Turkish giants and has made a significant impact on the team's performance. The post Victor Osimhen’s Saudi Rejection: Galatasaray Adventure Continues appeared first on FootItalia.com.
